personal_txt: I am a final-year student in Technical Degree in Software Development at the, Universidad Nacional del Centro (Tandil, Buenos Aires, Argentina). Throughout my studies, I have gained solid knowledge in software development, specializing in frontend technologies such as Angular and Next.js.
personal_txt_2: With a strong focus on continuous learning, I am looking to join a development team where I can contribute my skills and continue growing as a professional.
skills_txt: I have worked on academic and personal projects applying good practices with the purpose to create efficient and functional solutions. Its comfortable to me work on both sides of fullstack development but i have more experience on frontend, leaning myself towards the design and user experience side.
idiomas_txt: Spanish is my native languaje and I have an intermediate level of English which allows myself to work with documentation and multicultural enviroments.
descr_p1: Personal site, designed to bring people together to play a football game.
descr_p2: Academic proyect, its a mock ecommerce.
descr_p3: Simple page, you can see some information about any planet of the solar system.
